subject: United States Women's Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Since bursting onto the scene as a precocious 10-year-old, Michelle Wie has won only two L.P.G.A. tournaments, but her play Friday put her one stroke behind the leader at the U.S. Women’s Open.
snippet: Since bursting onto the scene as a precocious 10-year-old, Michelle Wie has won only two L.P.G.A. tournaments, but her play Friday put her one stroke behind the leader at the U.S. Women’s Open.
